postReview.title: Brighton 3-0 Chelsea: Minteh brace leads hosts to comfortable win
postReview.description: Chelsea's striker problems were laid bare on the south coast as they were beaten once again by Brighton, this time in the Premier League.

QAData.question: Who won between Brighton & Hove Albion and Chelsea on Fri, 14 Feb 2025 20:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brighton & Hove Albion won 3–0 over Chelsea on Fri, 14 Feb 2025 20:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Joel Veltman has the least touches (34) of any outfield player.
Trevoh Chalobah is the most accurate passer (95%) in the match.
Levi Colwill completed the most passes (114) in the match.
Yankuba Minteh was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.3.
Yankuba Minteh created the most chances (3) in the match.
Yankuba Minteh won the most duels (12) in the match.
